name: aws-url-shortener
description: AWS URL Shortener with Lambda and DynamoDB - Local Development

scripts.test:functions: npm run build && npm run start:api
scripts.install:deps: cd lambdas/urlShortenHandler && cp package.dev.json package.json && npm install && cd ../urlRedirectHandler && cp package.dev.json package.json && npm install
